__e: You think she needs protection from me?
Dean took you under his wing, he convinced you that you were so important, you just had to be out there, helping him save the world.
I don't know, I aimed for Magic School. They must have protected it from us.
Come on -- you're telling me that you went to the house of a protected witness... by mistake,yes.
Problem is... it's protected by some kind of... energy shield.
And if I did, which I totally don't, they'd be protected by the shield law.
I guess I want to know that she's being watched over by that community that you talked about.
There is no doubt that a wife holds the same protection under the law... from her husband and any other male acquaintance or stranger... with regard to her own body.
But she was a ward of the state, And it went into family service's files.
No one else has ever made me feel as safe as I feel with you.
Because if it's really that easy to kill the most protected person in the world, then none of us are safe.
